name: TeamsNotifier
description: Notifies a Microsoft Teams Channel about about a specific build artifact
helpMarkDown: Notifies a Microsoft Teams Channel (Office 365) about about a specific build artifact. Uses a simple AdaptiveCard format.
author: evy Solutions GmbH

inputs.name: teamsChannelName
inputs.label: Teams Webhook Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Teams Webhook Name of the notification target channel

inputs.name: teamsChannelWebhook
inputs.label: Teams Webhook URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: Teams Webhook URI of the notification target channel

inputs.name: templatePayLoadFilePath
inputs.label: Teams Message Payload Template File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full Path to a json Teams Message [AdaptiveCard](https://docs.microsoft.com/de-de/adaptive-cards/templating/) Template Path

inputs.name: iconImageSrc
inputs.label: Icon image Sourc
inputs.helpMarkDown: Icon image source path which will be used as ${photo} for templating

inputs.name: additionalHyperlink
inputs.label: Additional Hyperlink (URL)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional Hyperlink (URL) which will be available for templating

inputs.name: additionalInfo
inputs.label: Additional Text
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional text, hint or info which will be available for templating

inputs.name: additionalImageSrc
inputs.label: Additional Image Src Href
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional image source which will be available for templating

messages.TeamsNotifierOddJobStatus: No notification will be sent to Microsoft Teams channel '%s' due to build status '%s'.
messages.TeamsNotifierFailed: Failed to notify Microsoft Teams Channel %s. Cause: %s
messages.TeamsNotifierInvalidTemplateFile: Failed to parse json template '%s'. Please also consider that UTF-8 without BOM is required. Cause: %s
